GE07bhg4c15u:3: chandāṃsi yasya parṇāni yas taṃ veda sa veda-vit ||1||
GE07bhg4c15u:5: vairāgyeṇa vinā jñānaṃ na ca bhaktir ataḥ sphuṭam |
GE07bhg4c15u:7: pūrvādhyānte māṃ ca yo 'vyabhicāreṇa bhakti-yogena sevate [Gītā 14.26] ity ādinā parameśvaram ekānta-bhaktyā bhajatas tat-prasāda-labdha-jñānena brahma-bhāvo bhavatīty uktam |
GE07bhg4c15u:8_0: na caikānta-bhaktiḥ jñānaṃ cāviraktasya sambhavatīti vairāgya-pūrvakaṃ jñānam upadeṣṭu-kāmaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:8_1: prathamaṃ tāvat sārdha-ślokābhyāṃ saṃsāra-svarūpaṃ vṛkṣa-rūpakālaṅkāreṇa varṇayan
GE07bhg4c15u:9: ūrdhvam uttamaḥ kṣarākṣarābhyām utkṛṣṭaḥ puruṣottamo mūlaṃ yasya tam |
GE07bhg4c15u:10: adha iti tato 'rvācīnāṃ kāryopādhayo hiraṇyagarbhādayo gṛhyante |
GE07bhg4c15u:11: te tu śākhā iva śākhā yasya tam |
GE07bhg4c15u:12: vinaśvaratvena śvaḥ prabhāta-paryantam api na sthāsyatīti viśvāsānarhatvād aśvatthaṃ prāhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:16: chandāṃsi vedā yasya parṇāni dharmādharma-pratipādana-dvāreṇa cchāyā-sthānīyaiḥ karma-phalaiḥ saṃsāra-vṛkṣasya sarva-jīvāśrayaṇīyatva-pratipādanāt parṇa-sthānīyā vedāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:17: yas tam evambhūtam aśvatthaṃ veda sa eva vedārtha-vit |
GE07bhg4c15u:22: vedoktaiḥ karmabhiḥ sevyatām āpāditaś ca ity etāvān eva hi vedārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:23: ata evaṃ vidvān vedavid iti stūyate ||1||
GE07bhg4c15u:25: pūrvādhyāye bhagavtā saṃsāra-bandha-hetūn guṇān vyākhyāya teṣām atyayena brahma-bhāvo mokṣo mad-bhajanena labhyata ity uktam --
GE07bhg4c15u:27: sa guṇān samatītyaitān brahma-bhūyāya kalpate || [Gītā 14.26] iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:28: tatra manuṣyasya tava bhakti-yogena kathaṃ brahma-bhāva ity āśaṅkāyāṃ svasya brahma-rūpatā-jñāpanāya sūtra-bhūto 'yaṃ śloko bhagavatoktaḥ -
GE07bhg4c15u:30: śāśvatasya ca dharmasya sukhasyaikāntikasya ca ||[Gītā 14.27] iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:32: bhagavataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇasya hi tattvaṃ jñātvā tat-prema-bhajanena guṇātītaḥ san brahma-bhāvaṃ katham āpnuyāl loka iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:33_0: tatra brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham ity ādi bhagavad-vacanam ākarṇya mama tulyo manuṣyo
GE07bhg4c15u:33_1: 'yaṃ katham evaṃ vadatīti vismayāviṣṭam apratibhayā lajjayā ca kiṃcid api praṣṭum
GE07bhg4c15u:33_2: aśaknuvan tam arjunam ālakṣya kṛpayā sva-svarūpaṃ vivakṣuḥ śrī-bhagavān uvāca ūrdhveti |
GE07bhg4c15u:34_0: tatra viraktasyaiva saṃsārād bhagavat-tattva-jñāne 'dhikāro nānyatheti pūrvādhyāyoktaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:35: ūrdhvam utkṛṣṭaṃ mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ sva-prakāśa-paramānanda-rūpatvena nityatvena ca brahma |
GE07bhg4c15u:36: atahvordhvaṃ sarva-saṃsāra-bādhe 'py abādhitaṃ sarva-saṃsāra-bhramādhiṣṭhānaṃ brahma tad eva māyayā mūlam asyety ūrdhva-mūlam |
GE07bhg4c15u:37: adha ity arvācīnāḥ kāryopādhayo hiraṇyagrabhādyā gṛhyante |
GE07bhg4c15u:38: te nānā-dik-prasṛtatvāc chākhā iva śākhā asyety adhaḥ-śākham |
GE07bhg4c15u:39: āśu-vināśitvena na śvo 'pi sthāteti viśvāsānarham aśvattham māyā-mayaṃ saṃsāra-vṛkṣam avyayam anādy-ananta-dehādi-santānāśrayam ātma-jñānam antareṇānucchedyam
GE07bhg4c15u:40: anantam avyayam āhuḥ śrutayaḥ smṛtayaś ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:41: śrutayas tāvat -- ūrdhva-mūlo 'vāk-śākha eṣo 'śvatthaḥ sanātanaḥ [KaṭhU 2.3.1] ity ādyaḥ kaṭha-vallīṣu paṭhitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:42: arvāñco nikṛṣṭāḥ kāryopādhayo mahad-ahaṅkāra-tanmātrādayo vā śākhā asyety arvāk-śākha ity adhaḥ-śākha-pada-samānārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:51: etac chittvā ca bhittvā ca jñānena paramāsinā |
GE07bhg4c15u:52: tataś cātma-gatiṃ prāpya tasmān nāvartate punaḥ || [Mbh 14.35.20-22] ity ādayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:53: avyaktam avyākṛtaṃ māyopādhikaṃ brahma tad eva mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ tasmāt prabhavo yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c15u:56: saṃsārasya ca buddheḥ sakāśān nānā-vidhāḥ pariṇāmā bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c15u:57: tena sādharmyeṇa buddhir eva skandhas tan-mayas tat-pracuro 'yam |
GE07bhg4c15u:58: indriyāṇām antarāṇi cchidrāṇy eva koṭarāṇi yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c15u:59: mahānti bhūtāny ākāśādīni pṛthivy-antāni vividhāḥ śākhā yasya viśākhaḥ stambho yasyeti vā |
GE07bhg4c15u:63: etad brahma-vanam asya brahmaṇo jīva-rūpasya bhogyaṃ vananīyaṃ sambhajanīyam iti vanaṃ brahma sākṣivad ācarati
GE07bhg4c15u:64: na tv etat kṛtena lipyata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:65: etad brahma-vanaṃ saṃsāra-vṛkṣātmakaṃ chittvā ca bhittvā cāhaṃ,
GE07bhg4c15u:66: brahmāsmīty atidṛḍha-jñāna-khaḍgena sa-mūlaṃ nikṛtyety arthaḥ ātma-rūpāṃ gatiṃ prāpya tasmād ātma-rūpān mokṣān nāvartata ity arthaḥ | spaṣṭam itarat |
GE07bhg4c15u:67: atra ca gaṅgā-taraṅga-nudyamānottuṅga-tat-tīra-tiryaṅ-nipatitam ardhonmūlitaṃ mārutena mahāntam aśvattham upamānīkṛtya jīvantam iyaṃ rūpaka-kalpaneti draṣṭavyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:69: yasya māyā-mayasyāśvatthasya cchandāṃsi cchādanāt tattva-vastu-prāvaraṇāt saṃsāra-vṛkṣa-rakṣaṇād vā karma-kāṇḍāni ṛg-yajuḥ-sāma-lakṣaṇāni parṇānīva parṇāni |
GE07bhg4c15u:70: yathā vṛkṣasya parirakṣaṇāthāni parṇāni bhavanti tathā saṃsāra-vṛkṣasya parirakṣaṇāthāni karma-kāṇḍāni dharmādharmaa-tad-dhetu-phala-prakāśanārthatvāt teṣām |
GE07bhg4c15u:71: yas taṃ yathā-vyākhyātaṃ sa-mūlaṃ saṃsāra-vṛkṣaṃ māyā-mayam aśvatthaṃ veda jānāti sa veda-vit karma-brahmākhya-vedārtha-vit sa evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:74: sa ca saṃsāra-vṛkṣaḥ svarūpeṇa vinaśvaraḥ pravāha-rūpeṇa cānantaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:75: sa ca vedoktaiḥ karmabhiḥ sicyate brahma-jñānena ca cchidyata ity etāvān eva hi vedārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:76: yaś ca vedārthavit sa eva sarva-vid iti sa-mūla-vṛkṣa-jñānaṃ stauti sa vedavid iti ||1||
GE07bhg4c15u:79: uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti pañcadaśe kathā ||
GE07bhg4c15u:82: sa guṇān samatītyaitān brahma-bhūyāya kalpate || [Gītā 14.26] ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c15u:83: tatra tava manuṣyasya bhakti-yogena kathaṃ brahma-bhāva iti cet,
GE07bhg4c15u:84: satyam ahaṃ manuṣya eva kintu brahmaṇo 'pi tasya pratiṣṭhā paramāśraya ity asya sūtra-rūpasya vṛtti-sthānīyo 'yaṃ pañcadaśādhyāya ārabhyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:85: tatra sa guṇān samatītya ity uktam iti guṇamyo 'yaṃ saṃsāraḥ kaḥ,
GE07bhg4c15u:86: kuto vāyaṃ pravṛttas tad-bhaktyā saṃsāram atikrāmyan jīvo vā kaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:87: brahma-bhūyāya kalpate ity uktaṃ brahma vā kiṃ |
GE07bhg4c15u:88: brahmaṇaḥ pratiṣṭhā tvaṃ vā ka ity-ādy-apekṣāyāṃ prathamam atiśayokty-alaṅkāreṇa saṃsāro 'yam adbhuto 'śvattha-vṛkṣa iti varṇayati |
GE07bhg4c15u:89: ūrdhve sarva-lokopari-tale satya-loke prakṛti-bījottha-prathama-praroha-rūpa-mahat-tattvātmakaś caturmukha eka eva mūlaṃ yasya tam |
GE07bhg4c15u:91_1: tāḥ śākhā yasya tam aśvatthaṃ dharmādi-caturvarga-sādhakatvād aśvattham uttamaṃ vṛkṣam |
GE07bhg4c15u:92: śleṣeṇa bhaktimatāṃ na śvaḥ sthāsyatīty aśvatthaṃ naṣṭa-prāyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:94: chandāṃsi vāyavyaṃ śvetam ālabheta bhūmikām aindram ekādaśaka-pālaṃ nirvapet prajākāmaḥ ity ādyāḥ karma-pratipādakā vedāḥ saṃsāra-vardhakatvāt parṇāni |
GE07bhg4c15u:97: tathā ca ūrdhva-mūlo 'vāk-śākha eṣo 'śvatthaḥ sanātanaḥ [KaṭhU 2.3.1] iti kaṭha-vallī-śrutiḥ ||1||
GE07bhg4c15u:100: ahaṃ sarvottamaḥ śrīmān iti pañcadaśe smṛtam ||
GE07bhg4c15u:101: pūrvatra vijñānānandasyautpattika-guṇāṣṭakasyāpi jīvasya karma-rūpānādi-vāsanānuguṇena bhagavat-saṅkalpena prakṛti-guṇa-saṅgaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:102_0: sa ca bahuvidhas tad-atyayaś ca bhagavad-bhakti-śiraskena viveka-jñānena bhavet tasmiṃś
GE07bhg4c15u:102_1: ca sati samprāpta-nija-svarūpo jīvo bhagavantam āśritya prmodo sarvadā tasmiṃs tiṣṭhatīty uktam |
GE07bhg4c15u:103: atha tad-viveka-jñāna-sthairya-karaṃ vairāgyaṃ jīvasya bhajanīya-bhagavad-aṃśatvaṃ bhagavataḥ svetara-sarvottamatvaṃ cokteṣv artheṣūpayogāya pañcadaśe 'smin varṇyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:104: tatra tāvad guṇa-viracitasya saṃsārasya vairāgya-vaiccedyatvāt saṃsāraṃ vṛkṣatvena vairāgyaṃ ca śastratvena rūpayan varṇayati bhagavān -- ūrdhvamūlam ity ādibhis tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:107: adhaḥ satya-lokād arvācīneṣu svar-bhuvar-bhūr-lokeṣu deva-gandharva-kinnarāsura-yakṣa-rākṣasa-manuṣya-paśu-pakṣi-kīṭa-pataṅga-sthāvarāntā nānādik-prasṛtatvāc chākhā yasya tam |
GE07bhg4c15u:109: tādṛśena viveka-jñānena vinā nivṛtter abhāvād avyayaṃ pravāha-rūpeṇa nityaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:114: vṛkṣaṃ yo veda samprati || [KaṭhU 2.3.1] ity ādikāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:115_0: yasya saṃsārāśvatthasya chandāṃsi karmākarma-pratipādakāni śruti-vākyāni vāsanāā-rūpa-tan-nidāna-vardhakatvāt
GE07bhg4c15u:115_1: parṇāni prāhus tāni cchandāṃsi vāyavyaṃ śvetam ālabheta bhūti-kāma aindram ekādaśaka-pālaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:116: patrais tarur vardhate śobhate ca tam aśvatthaṃ yo veda yathoktaṃ jānāti sa eva veda-vit |
GE07bhg4c15u:117: vedaḥ khalu saṃsārasya vṛkṣatvaṃ chedyatvābhiprāyeṇāha tad-chedanopāyajño vedārthavid iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:126: teṣu ca ye duṣkṛtinas te 'dhaḥ paśv-ādi-yoniṣu prasṛtās tasya saṃsāra-vṛkṣasya śākhāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:127: kiṃ ca, guṇaiḥ sattvādi-vṛttibhir jala-secanair iva yathāyathaṃ pravṛddhā vṛddhiṃ prāptāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:128: kiṃ ca, viṣayā rūpādayaḥ pravālāḥ pallava-sthānīyā yāsāṃ tāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:130: kiṃ ca, adhaś ca ca-śabdād ūrdhvaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:137: hi karma-kṣaye manuṣya-lokaṃ prāptānāṃ tat-tad-anurūpeṣu karmasu pravṛttir bhavati |
GE07bhg4c15u:138: tasminn eva hi karmādhikāro nānyeṣu lokeṣu |
GE07bhg4c15u:140: madhusūdanaḥ : tasyaiva saṃsāra-vṛkṣasyāvayava-sambandhiny aparā kalpanocyate adhaś ceti |
GE07bhg4c15u:143: teṣu ye kapūya-caraṇā duṣkṛtinas te 'dhaḥ paśv-ādi-yoniṣu prasṛtā vistāraṃ gatāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:144_0: ye tu ramaṇīya-caraṇāḥ sukṛtinas ta ūrdhvaṃ devādi-yoniṣu prasṛtā ato 'dhaś ca manuṣyatvād
GE07bhg4c15u:144_1: ārabhya viriñci-paryantam ūrdhvaṃ ca tasmād evārabhya satya-loka-paryantaṃ prasṛtās
GE07bhg4c15u:146: guṇaiḥ sattva-rajas-tamo bhir dehendriya-viṣayākāra-pariṇatair jala-secanair iva pravṛddhāḥ sthūlībhūtāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:148: viṣayāḥ śabdādayaḥ pravālāḥ pallavā iva yāsāṃ saṃsāra-vṛkṣa-śākhānāṃ tās tathā śākhāgra-sthānīyābhir
GE07bhg4c15u:152_0: adhaś ca ca-śabdād ūrdhvaṃ ca mūlāny avāntarāṇi tat-tad-bhoga-janita-rāga-dveṣādi-vāsanā-lakṣaṇāni
GE07bhg4c15u:153: mukhyaṃ ca mūlaṃ brahmaiveti na doṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:155: karma dharmādharma-lakṣaṇam anubandhuṃ paścāj janayituṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni karmānubandhīni |
GE07bhg4c15u:157: manuṣya-loke manuṣyaś cāsau lokaaś cety adhikṛto brāhmaṇyādi-viśiṣṭo deho manuṣya-lokas tasmin bāhulyena karmānubandhīni |
GE07bhg4c15u:160: adhaḥ paśv-ādi-yoniṣu ūrdhve devādi-yoniṣu prasṛtās tasya saṃsāra-vṛkṣasya guṇaiḥ sattvādi-vṛttibhir jala-sekair iva pravṛddhāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:161: viṣayā śabdādayaḥ pravālāḥ pallava-sthānīyā yāsāṃ tāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:162_0: kiṃ ca tasya mūle sarva-lokair alakṣito mahā-nidhiḥ kaścid astīty anumīyate yam eva
GE07bhg4c15u:162_1: mūla-jaṭābhir avalambya sthitasya tasyāśvattha-vṛkṣasyāpi baṭa-vṛkṣasyeva śākhāsv
GE07bhg4c15u:162_2: api bāhyā jaṭāḥ santīty āha adhaś ceti |
GE07bhg4c15u:163: brahma-loka-mūlasyāpi tasyādhaś ca manuṣya-loke karmānubandhīni karmānulambīni mūlāny anusantatāni nirantaraṃ vistṛtāni bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c15u:164: karma-phalānāṃ yatas tato bhogānte punar manuṣya-janmany eva karmasu pravṛttāni bhavantīty arthaḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c15u:166: tasyokta-lakṣaṇasya saṃsārāśvatthasya śākhā adha ūrdhvaṃ ca prasṛtāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:167: adho manuṣya-paśv-ādi-yoniṣu duṣkṛtair ūrdhvaṃ ca deva-gandharvādi-yoniṣu sukṛtair vistṛtāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:168: guṇaiḥ sattvādi-vṛttibhir ambu-niṣekair iva pravṛddhāḥ sthaulya-bhājaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:169: viṣayāḥ śabda-sparśādayaḥ pravālāḥ pallavā yāsāṃ tāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:170: śākhāgra-sthānīyābhiḥ śrotrādi-vṛttibhir yogād rāgādhiṣṭhānatvāc ca śabdādīnāṃ pallava-sthānīyatvam |
GE07bhg4c15u:171: tasyāśvatthasyādhaś ca śabdād ūrdhvaṃ cāvāntarāṇi mūlāny anusantatāni vistṛtāni santi |
GE07bhg4c15u:173: mukhyaṃ mūlaṃ tādṛk caturmukhas tat-tad-vāsanās tv avāntara-mūlāni nyagrodhasyaiva jaṭopajaṭāvṛndānīti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:174: tāni kīdṛśānīty āha manuṣya-loke karmānubandhīni yatas tataḥ karma-phala-bhogāvasāne sati punar manuṣya-loke karma-hetu-bhūtāni bhavantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:175: sa lokaḥ khalu karma-bhūmir iti prasiddham ||2||
GE07bhg4c15u:179: nānto na cādir na ca saṃpratiṣṭhā |
GE07bhg4c15u:186: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca, na rūpam iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:187: iha saṃsāre sthitaiḥ prāṇibhir asya saṃsāra-vṛkṣasya tathordhva-mūlatvādi-prakāreṇa rūpaṃ nopalabhyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:192: yasmād evambhūto 'yaṃ saṃsāra-vṛkṣo durucchedo 'narthakaraś ca tasmād enaṃ dṛḍhena vairāgyena śastreṇa cchitvā tattva-jñāne yatetety āha aśvattham enam iti sārdhena |
GE07bhg4c15u:195: tena śastreṇa dṛḍhena samyag-vicāreṇa cchittvā pṛthak-kṛtya ||3||
GE07bhg4c15u:197: tataś tasya mūla-bhūtaṃ tat padaṃ vastu parimārgitavyam anveṣṭavyaṃ |
GE07bhg4c15u:198: kīdṛśaṃ, yasmin gatā yat padaṃ prāptāḥ santo bhūyo na nivartanti nāvartanta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:200: yata eṣā purāṇī cirantanī saṃsāra-pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā vistṛtā |
GE07bhg4c15u:201: tam eva cādyaṃ puruṣaṃ prapadye śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi |
GE07bhg4c15u:204_0: yas tv ayaṃ saṃsāra-vṛkṣo varṇita iha saṃsāre sthitaiḥ prāṇibhir asya saṃsāra-vṛkṣasya
GE07bhg4c15u:204_1: tathordhva-mūlatvādi tathā tena prakāreṇa rūpaṃ nopalabhyate svapna-marīcy-udaka-māyā-gandharva-nagaravan
GE07bhg4c15u:211_0: yasmād evaṃ-bhūto 'yaṃ saṃsāra-vṛkṣo durucchedaḥ sarvānartha-karaś ca tasmād anādy-ajñānena
GE07bhg4c15u:211_1: suvirūḍha-mūlam atyanta-baddha-mūlaṃ prāg-uktam aśvatthaṃ asaṅga-śastreṇa saṅgaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:211_2: spṛhāsaṅgaḥ saṅga-virodhi vairāgyaṃ putra-vitta-lokaiṣaṇā-tyāga-rūpaṃ tad eva śastraṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:213_0: tenāsaṅga-śastreṇa dṛḍhena paramātma-jñānautsukhya-dṛḍhīkṛtena punaḥ punar vivekābhyāsa-niśitena
GE07bhg4c15u:213_1: cchittvā sa-mūlam uddhṛtya vairāgya-śama-damādi-sampattyā sarva-karma-saṃnyāsaṃ kṛtvety etat ||3 ||
GE07bhg4c15u:214_0: tato gurum upasṛtya tato 'śvatthād ūrdhvaṃ vyavasthitaṃ tad vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ vedānta-vākya-vicāreṇa
GE07bhg4c15u:214_1: parimārgitavyaṃ mārgayitavyam anveṣṭavyaṃ so 'nveṣṭabhyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavya iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:215: tat padaṃ śravaṇādinā jñātavyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:216: kiṃ tat padaṃ yasmin pade gatāḥ praviṣṭā jñānena na nivartanti nāvartante bhūyaḥ punaḥ saṃsārāya |
GE07bhg4c15u:218_0: ity āha - yaḥ pada-śabdenoktas tam eva cādyam ādau bhavaṃ puruṣaṃ yenedaṃ sarvaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:218_1: pūrṇaṃ taṃ puruṣu pūrṣu vā śayānaṃ prapadye śaraṇaṃ gato 'smīty evaṃ tad-eka-śaraṇatayā
GE07bhg4c15u:220: yato yasmāt puruṣāt pravṛttir māyā-maya-saṃsāra-vṛkṣa-pravṛttiḥ purāṇī cirantany anādir eṣā prasṛtā niḥsṛtaindrajālikād iva māyā-hasty-ādi
GE07bhg4c15u:223: kiṃ ceha manuṣya-loke 'sya rūpaṃ svarūpaṃ tathā sa-niścayaṃ nopalabhyate satyo 'yaṃ mithyāyaṃ nityo 'yam iti vādi-mata-vaividhyād iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:224: na cānto 'paryantatvān na cādir anāditvān na ca sampratiṣṭhāśrayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:225: kiṃ vādhāraḥ ko 'yam ity api nopalabhyate tattva-jñānābhāvād iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:226: yathā tathāyaṃ bhavatu jīva-mātra-duḥkhaika-nidānasyāsya chedakaṃ śastram asaṅgaṃ jñātvā tenaitaṃ chittvaivāsya mūla-tala-stho mahānidhir anveṣṭavya ity āha aśvattham iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:227: asaṅgo 'nāsaktiḥ sarvatra vairāgyam iti yāvat tena śastreṇa kuṭhāreṇa cchitvā svataḥ pṛthak-kṛtya tatas tasya mūla-bhūtaṃ tat-padaṃ vastu mahā-nidhi-rūpaṃ brahma parimārgitavyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:228: kīdṛśaṃ tad ata āha yasmin gatā yat padaṃ prāptāḥ santo bhūyo na nivartante na cāvartanta ity arthaḥ | anveṣaṇa-prakāram
GE07bhg4c15u:229: āha yata eṣā purāṇī cirantanī saṃsāra-pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā vistṛtā tam evādyaṃ puruṣaṃ prapadye bhajāmīti bhaktyā anveṣṭavyam ity arthaḥ ||3-4||
GE07bhg4c15u:231: na rūpam iti asyāśvatthasya rūpam iha manuṣya-loke tathā nopalabhyate yathordhva-mūlatvādi-dharmakatayā mayopavarṇitam |
GE07bhg4c15u:233: katham ayaṃ anartha-vrāta-jaṭilo vinaśyed iti na jñāyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:242: sāsmin deśe 'smin grāme nivasāmīty etāvad eva vijñāyata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:243_0: yasmād evaṃ durbodho 'nartha-vrate hetuś cāyam aśvatthas tasmāt sat-prasaṅga-labdha-vastu-yāthātmya-jñānenainam
GE07bhg4c15u:243_1: asaṅga-śastreṇa vairāgya-kuṭhāreṇa dṛḍhena vivekābhyāsa-niśitena cchitvā svataḥ pṛthak-kṛtya
GE07bhg4c15u:245: tad eva śastraṃ tad-abhilāṣa-nāśakatvāt suvirūḍha-mūlaṃ pūrvokta-rītyātyantaṃ baddha-mūlam |
GE07bhg4c15u:246: tataḥ saṃsārāśvattha-mūlād uparisthitaṃ tat padaṃ parimārgitavyaṃ mat-prasaṅga-labdhaiḥ śravaṇādibhiḥ sādhanair anveṣṭavyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:247: tat padaṃ kīdṛśaṃ tatrāha yasminn iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:248: yasmin gatās taiḥ sādhanair yat prāptā janās tato na nivartante svargād iva na patanti |
GE07bhg4c15u:250: yataḥ purāṇī cirantanīyaṃ jagat-pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā vistṛtā |
GE07bhg4c15u:251: tam eva cādyaṃ puruṣaṃ prapadye śaraṇaṃ vrajāmīti prapatti-pūrvakaiḥ śravaṇādibhis tan-mārgaṇam uktam |
GE07bhg4c15u:252: yo jagad-dhetur yat-porapattyā saṃsāra-nivṛttiḥ sa khalu kṛṣṇa eva ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavaḥ ity ādeḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:253: daivī hy eṣā guṇamayī ity ādeś ca tad-ukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:254: na tad bhāsayata ity ādinā vyaktībhāvitvāc ca ||3-4||
GE07bhg4c15u:261: śrīdharaḥ : tat-prāptau sādhanāntarāṇi darśayann āha nirmāneti |
GE07bhg4c15u:270: madhusūdanaḥ : parimārgaṇa-pūrvakaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ gacchatām aṅgāntarāṇy āha nirmāṇeti |
GE07bhg4c15u:276: jita-saṅga-doṣāḥ priyāpriya-saṃvidhāv api rāga-dveṣa-varjitā iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c15u:278: vinivṛtta-kāmā viśeṣeto niravaśeṣeṇa nivṛttāḥ kāmā viṣaya-bhogā yeṣāṃ te |
GE07bhg4c15u:280_1: sukha-duḥkha-nāmakaiḥ sukha-duḥkha-saṅgair iti pāṭhāntare sukha-duḥkhābhyāṃ saṅgaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:282: amūḍhā vedānta-pramāṇa-saṃjāta-samyag-jñāna-nivāritātmaājñānās tad avyayaṃ yathoktaṃ padaṃ gacchanti ||5||
GE07bhg4c15u:284: tad-bhaktau satyāṃ janāḥ kīdṛśā bhūtvā taṃ padaṃ prāpnuvantīty apekṣāyām āha nirmāneti |
GE07bhg4c15u:285: adhyātma-nityā adhyātma-vicāro nity nitya-kartavyo yeṣāṃ te paramātmālocana-tat-parāḥ ||5||
GE07bhg4c15u:286: baladevaḥ : tat-prapattau satyāṃ kīdṛśāḥ santas tat padaṃ prāpnuvantīty āha nirmāneti |
GE07bhg4c15u:290: adhyātmaṃ sva-parātma-viṣayako vimarśaḥ sa nityo nitya-kartavyo yeṣāṃ te |
GE07bhg4c15u:291: sukhādi-hetutvāt tat-saṃjñair dvandvaiḥ śītoṣṇādibhir vimuktās tat-sahiṣṇavaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:293: na tad bhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅko na pāvakaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:294: yad gatvā na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama ||6||
GE07bhg4c15u:295: śrīdharaḥ : tad eva gantavyaṃ padaṃ viśinaṣṭi na tad iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:300: madhusūdanaḥ : tad eva gantavyaṃ padaṃ viśinaṣṭi na tad iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:301: yad vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ gatvā yogino na nivartante tat padaṃ sarvāvabhāsana-śaktimān api sūryo na bhāsayate |
GE07bhg4c15u:302: sūryāsta-maye 'pi candro bhāsako dṛṣṭa ity āśaṅkyāha na śaśāṅkaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:303: sūryācandramasor ubhayor apy asta-maye 'gniḥ prakāśako dṛṣṭa ity āśaṅkyāha na pāvakaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:305: kutaḥ sūryādīnāṃ tatra prakāśanāsāmarthyam ity ata āha tad dhāma jyotiḥ svayaṃ-prakāśam ādiyādi-sakala-jaḍa-jyotir-avabhāsakaṃ paramaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ mama viṣṇoḥ svarūpātmakaṃ padam |
GE07bhg4c15u:306: na hi yo yad-bhāsyaḥ sa svabhāsakaṃ taṃ bhāsayitum īṣṭe | tathā ca śrutiḥ -
GE07bhg4c15u:307: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:310: tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti || [KaṭhU 2.2.15] iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:311: etena tat padaṃ vedyaṃ na vā,
GE07bhg4c15u:312: ādye vedya-bhinna-veditṛ-sāpekṣatvena dvaitāpattir dvitīye sva-puruṣārthatvāpattir ity apāstam |
GE07bhg4c15u:313: avedyatve saty api svayam aparokṣatvāt tatrāvedyatvaṃ sūryādy-abhāsyatvenātroktaṃ,
GE07bhg4c15u:314: sarva-bhāsakatvena tu svayam aparokṣatvaṃ yad āditya-gataṃ teja ity atra vakṣyati |
GE07bhg4c15u:315: evam ubhābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ śruter dalad-vacaṃ vyākhyātam iti draṣṭavyam ||6||
GE07bhg4c15u:316: viśvanāthaḥ : tat padam eva kīdṛśam ity apekṣāyām āha na tad iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:318: tan mama paramaṃ dhāma sarvotkṛṣṭam ajaḍam atīndriyaṃ tejaḥ sarva-prakāśakam |
GE07bhg4c15u:320: tat paraṃ paramaṃ brahma sarvaṃ vibhajate jagat |
GE07bhg4c15u:321: mamaiva tad ghanaṃ tejo jñātum arhasi bhārata || [HV 2.114.12] iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:322: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:325: tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti || iti [KaṭhU 2.2.15] śrutibhyaś ca ||6||
GE07bhg4c15u:326: baladevaḥ : gantavyaṃ padaṃ viśiṣyan paricāyayati na tad iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:327: prapannā yad gatvā yato na nivartante |
GE07bhg4c15u:328: tan mamaiva dhāma svarūpaṃ paramaṃ śrīmat |
GE07bhg4c15u:329: sarvāvabhāsakā api sūryādayas tan na bhāsayanti prakāśayanti |
GE07bhg4c15u:330: na tatra sūryo bhāti ity ādi-śruteś ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:331: sūryādibhir aprakāśyas teṣāṃ prakāśakaḥ sva-prakāśaka-cid-vigraho lakṣmīpatir aham eva pada-śabda-bodhyaḥ prapannair labhya ity arthaḥ ||6||
GE07bhg4c15u:337_0: nanu ca tvadīyaṃ dhāma prāptāḥ santo yadi na nivartante tarhi sati sampadya na viduḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:337_1: sati sampadyāmahe ity ādi śruteḥ suṣupti-pralaya-samaye tattva-prāptiḥ sarveṣām astīti
GE07bhg4c15u:337_2: ko nāma saṃsārī syād ity āśaṅkya saṃsāriṇaṃ darśayati mamaiveti pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:338: mamaivāṃśo yo 'yam avidyayā jīva-bhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ sarvadā saṃsāritvena prasiddhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:339: asau suṣupti-pralayayoḥ prakṛtau līnatayā sthitāni manaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ yeṣāṃ tānīndriyāṇi punar jīva-loke saṃsāropabhogārtham ākarṣati |
GE07bhg4c15u:341: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ saatyaṃ suṣupti-pralayayor api mad-aṃśatvāt sarvasāpi jīva-mātrasya mayi layād asty eva mat-prāptiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:342: tathāpy avidyāyāvṛtasya sānuśayasya sa-prakṛtike mayi layaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:346: ataś ca punaḥ saṃsārāya nirgacchan avidvān prakṛtau līnatayā sthitāni svopādhi-bhūtānīndriyāṇi ākarṣati |
GE07bhg4c15u:348: madhusūdanaḥ : jīvasya tu pāramārthikaṃ svarūpaṃ brahmaivety asakṛd āveditam |
GE07bhg4c15u:349: tad etat sarvaṃ pratipādyata uttareṇa granthena |
GE07bhg4c15u:350: tatra jīvasya brahma-rūpatvād ajñāna-nivṛttyā tat-svarūpaṃ prāptasya tato na pracyutir iti pratipādyate mamaivāṃśa [Gītā 15.7a] iti ślokārdhena |
GE07bhg4c15u:351: suṣuptau tu sarva-kārya-saṃskāra-sahitājñāna-sattvāt tataḥ punaḥ saṃsāro jīvasyeti manaḥ-ṣaṣṭhāni [Gītā 15.7b] iti ślokārdhena pratipādyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:352: tatas tasya vastuto 'saṃsāriṇo 'pi māyayā saṃsāraṃ prāptasya manda-matibhir deha-tādātmyaṃ prāpitasya dehād vyatirekaḥ pratipādyate śarīram [Gītā 15.8] ity ādinā ślokārdhena |
GE07bhg4c15u:353: śrotraṃ cakṣur [Gītā 15.9] ity ādinā tu yathāyathaṃ sva-viṣayeṣv indriyāṇāṃ pravartakasya tasya tebhyo vyatirekaḥ pratipādyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:355: kim iti sarve na paśyantīty āśaṅkāyāṃ viṣaya-vikṣipta-cittā darśana-yogyam api taṃ na paśyantīty uttaram ucyate utkrāmantam [Gītā 15.10a] ity ādinā ślokena |
GE07bhg4c15u:356: taṃ jñāna-cakṣuṣaḥ paśyantīti vivṛtaṃ yatanto yoginaḥ [Gītā 15.11a] iti ślokārdhena |
GE07bhg4c15u:357: vimūḍhā nānupaśyanti [Gītā 15.10b] ity etad vivṛtaṃ yatanto 'pi [Gītā 15.11b] iti ślokārdheneti pañcānāṃ ślokānāṃ saṅgatiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:359: mamaiva paramātmano 'ṃśo niraṃśasyāpi māyayā kalpitaḥ sūryasyeva jale nabhasa iva ca ghaṭe mṛṣābhedavān aṃśa ivāṃśo jīva-loke saṃsāre,
GE07bhg4c15u:360: sa ca prāṇa-dhāraṇopādhinā jīva-bhūtaḥ kartā bhoktā saṃsaratīti mṛṣaiva prasiddhim upāgataḥ sanātano nitya upādhi-paricchede 'pi vastutaḥ paramātmatva-rūpatvāt |
GE07bhg4c15u:361: ato jñānādi-jñāna-nivṛttyā sva-svarūpaṃ brahma prāpya tato na nivartanta iti yuktam |
GE07bhg4c15u:362_0: evam-bhūto 'pi suṣuptāt katham āvartata ity āha - manaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni śrotra-tvak-cakṣū-rasana-ghrāṇākhyāni
GE07bhg4c15u:362_3: bhogārthaṃ karṣati kūrmo 'ṅgānīva prakṛter ajñānād ākarṣati viṣaya-grahaṇa-yogyatayāvirbhāvayatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:363: ato jñānād anāvṛttāv apy ajñānād āvṛttir nānupapanneti bhāvaḥ ||7||
GE07bhg4c15u:365: tvad-bhaktyā saṃsāram atikrāmyan ta-pada-gāmī jīvaḥ ka ity apekṣāyām āha mamaivāṃśa iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:366: yad uktaṃ vārāhe svāṃśaś cātha vibhinnāṃśa iti dvedhāyam iṣyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:368: sanātano nityaḥ sa ca baddha-daśāyāṃ manaḥ eva ṣaṣṭhaṃ yeṣāṃ tānīndriyāṇi prakṛtāv upādhau sthitāni karṣati |
GE07bhg4c15u:369: mamaiva etānīti svīyatvābhimānena gṛhītāṃ pādārgala-śṛṅkhalām iva karṣati ||7||
GE07bhg4c15u:370: baladevaḥ : nanu tvat-prapattyā yas tat-padaṃ yāti, sa jīvaḥ ka ity apekṣāyām āha mamaiveti |
GE07bhg4c15u:375: sa ca jīva-loke prapañce sthito manaḥ-ṣaṣṭhānīndriyāṇi śrotrādīni karṣati pādādi-śṛṅkhalā iva vahati |
GE07bhg4c15u:376: tāni kīdṛṃśīty āha prakṛti-sthāni prakṛti-vikāra-bhūtāhaṅkāra-kāryāṇīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:377: tatra manaḥ sāttvikāhaṅkārasya śrotrādikaṃ tu rājasāhaṅkārasya kāryam iti bodhyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:378_0: bhagavat-prapattyā prākṛta-karaṇa-hīno bhagaval-lokaṃ gatas tu bhāgavatair deha-karaṇair
GE07bhg4c15u:378_1: vibhūṣaṇair iva viśiṣṭo bhagavantaṃ saṃśrayan nivasatīti sūcyate -- sa vā eṣa brahma-niṣṭha
GE07bhg4c15u:378_2: idaṃ śarīraṃ martyam atisṛjya brahmābhisampadya brahmaṇā paśyati brahmaṇā
GE07bhg4c15u:379: śṛṇoti brahmaṇaivedaṃ sarvam anubhavati iti mādhyandināyana-śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:380: vasanti yatra puruṣāḥ sarve vaikuṇṭha-mūrtayaḥ [BhP 3.15.14] ity ādi smṛteś ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:382_0: yat tu ghaṭākāśavaj jalākāśavad vā jīve brahmaṇo 'ṃśo 'ntaḥ-karaṇenāvacchedāt tasmin
GE07bhg4c15u:382_1: pratibimba-nāśād vā ghaṭa-jala-nāśe tat-tad-ākāśasya śuddhākāśatvavad antaḥ-karaṇa-nāśe
GE07bhg4c15u:387: paricchedādi-vāda-dvayasya dehino 'smin yathā [Gītā 2.12] ity atra pratyākhyānāc ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:388: pratibimba-sādṛśyāt tu tattvaṃ mantavyam ambuvad adhikaraṇa-vinirṇayāt |
GE07bhg4c15u:389: tasmāt brahmopasarjanatvaṃ jīvasya brahmāṃśatvaṃ vidhu-maṇḍalasya śatāṃśaḥ śukra-maṇḍalam ity ādau dṛṣṭaṃ cedam eka-vastv-eka-deśatvaṃ cāṃśatvam āhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:390: brahma khalu śaktimad ekaṃ vastu brahma-śaktiḥ,
GE07bhg4c15u:391: itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parāṃ jīva-bhūtām [Gītā 7.5] iti pūrvokter atas tad eka-deśāt
GE07bhg4c15u:395: śarīraṃ yad avāpnoti yac cāpy utkrāmatīśvaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:399: yad yadā śarīrāntaraṃ karma-vaśād avāpnoti yataś ca śarīrād utkrāmatīśvaro dehādīnāṃ svāmī tadā pūrvasmāt śarīrād etāni gṛhītvā tac-charīrāntaraṃ samyag yāti |
GE07bhg4c15u:401: āśayāt sva-sthānāt kusumādeḥ sakāśāt gandhān gandhavataḥ sūkṣmān aṃśān gṛhītvā vāyur yathā gacchati tadvat ||8||
GE07bhg4c15u:402: madhusūdanaḥ : asmin kāle karṣatīty ucyate śarīram iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:403_0: yad yadotkrāmati bahir nirgacchatīśvaro dehendriya-saṃghātasya svāmī jīvas tadā yato
GE07bhg4c15u:403_1: dehād utkrāmati tato manaḥ-ṣaṣṭhānīndriyāṇi karṣatīti dvitīya-pādasya prathamam anvaya
GE07bhg4c15u:405: kintu yad yadā ca pūrvasmāc charīrāntaram avāpnoti tadaitāni manaḥ-ṣaṣṭhāīndriyāṇi gṛhītvā saṃyāty api samyak punar āgamana-rāhityena gacchaty api |
GE07bhg4c15u:406: śarīre saty evendriya-grahaṇe dṛṣṭāntaḥ - āśayāt kusumādeḥ sthānād gandhān gandhātmakān sūkṣmān aṃśān gṛhītvā yathā vāyur vāti tadvat ||8||
GE07bhg4c15u:407: viśvanāthaḥ : tāny akṛṣya kiṃ karotīty apekṣāyām āha śarīram iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:409: yac ca yasmāc ca śarīrād utkrāmati niṣkrāmati,
GE07bhg4c15u:410_0: īśvaro dehendriyādi-svāmī jīvaḥ tasmāt tatra etānīndriyāṇi bhūta-sūkṣmaiḥ saha gṛhītvaiva
GE07bhg4c15u:410_1: saṃyāti vāyur gandhāni iveti vāyur yathāśayād gandhāśrayāt srak-candanādeḥ sakāśāt
GE07bhg4c15u:410_2: sūkṣmāvayavaiḥ saha gandhān gṛhītvānyatra yāti tadvad ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:411: baladevaḥ : jīva-loke sthita indriyāṇi karṣati ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c15u:413: īśvaraḥ śarīrendriyāṇaṃ svāmī jīvo yad yadā pūrva-śarīrād anyac charīram avāpnoti,
GE07bhg4c15u:415: tadaitānīndriyāṇi bhūta-sūkṣmaiḥ saha gṛhṭivā yāty āśayāt puṣpa-kośād gandhān gṛhītvā vāyur iva sa yathānyatra yāti tadvat ||8||
GE07bhg4c15u:416: śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:418: śrīdharaḥ : tāny evendriyāṇi darśayan yad arthaṃ gṛhītvā gacchati tad āha śrotram iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:420: tāny adhiṣṭāyāśritya śabdādīn viṣayān ayaṃ jīva upabhuṅkte ||9||
GE07bhg4c15u:421: madhusūdanaḥ : tāny evendriyāṇi darśayan yad arthaṃ gṛhītvā gacchati tad āha śrotram iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:422: śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:423: ca-kārāt karmendriyāṇi prāṇaṃ ca manaś ca ṣaṣṭham adhiṣṭhāyaivāśrityaiva viṣayān śabdādīn ayaṃ jīva upasevate bhuṅkte ||9||
GE07bhg4c15u:424: viśvanāthaḥ : tatra gatvā kiṃ karotīty ata āha śrotram iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:425: śrotrādīnīndriyāṇi manaś cādhiṣṭhāyāśritya viṣayān śabdādīn upabhuṅkte ||9||
GE07bhg4c15u:426: baladevaḥ : tāni gṛhītvā kim arthaṃ yāti |
GE07bhg4c15u:428: śrotrādīni samanaskāny adhiṣṭhāyāśrityāyaṃ jīvo viṣayān śabdādīn upabhuṅkte |
GE07bhg4c15u:430: ca-śabdāt karmendriyāṇi ca pañca prāṇāṃś cādhiṣṭhāye ty avagamyam ||9||
GE07bhg4c15u:433: utkrāmantaṃ sthitaṃ vāpi bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitam |
GE07bhg4c15u:435: śrīdharaḥ : nanu kārya-kāraṇa-saṅghāta-vyatirekeṇa evambhūtam ātmānaṃ sarve 'pi kiṃ na paśyanti |
GE07bhg4c15u:437: utkrāmantaṃ dehād dehāntaraṃ gacchantaṃ tasminn eva dehe sthitaṃ vā viṣayān bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitam indriyādi-yuktaṃ jīvaṃ vimūḍhā nānupaśyanti nālokayanti |
GE07bhg4c15u:438: jñānam eva cakṣur yeṣāṃ te vivekinaḥ paśyanti ||10||
GE07bhg4c15u:439: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ deha-gataṃ darśana-yogayam api dehāt utkrāmantam iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:444: evaṃ sarvāsv avasthāsu darśana-yogyam apy enaṃ vimūḍhā dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-viṣaya-bhoga-vāsanākṛṣṭa-cetastayātmānātma-vivekāyogyā nānupaśyanti |
GE07bhg4c15u:445: aho kaṣṭaṃ vartata ity ajñān anukrośati bhagavān |
GE07bhg4c15u:446: ye tu pramāṇa-janita-jñāna-cakṣuṣo vivekinas ta eva paśyanti ||10||
GE07bhg4c15u:448: nanu yamād dehān niṣkrāmati yasmin dehe vā tiṣṭhati tatra sthitvā vā yathā bhogān bhuṅkte ity evaṃ viśeṣaṃ nopalabhāmahe |
GE07bhg4c15u:450: sthitaṃ dehāntare vartamānaṃ ca viṣayān bhuñjānaṃ ca guṇānvitam indiryādi-sahitaṃ vimūḍhā avivekinaḥ jñāna-cakṣuṣo vivekinaḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c15u:451: baladevaḥ : evaṃ śarīrasthatvenānubhavayogyam avivekinas tam ātmānaṃ nānubhavantīty āha ud iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:452_0: śarīrād utkrāmantaṃ tatraiva sthitaṃ vā sthitvā viṣayān bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitaṃ sukha-duḥkha-mohair
GE07bhg4c15u:452_1: indiryādibhir vānvitaṃ yuktam anubhava-yogyam apy ātmānaṃ vimūḍhāś cirantana-jñāna-cakṣuṣo
GE07bhg4c15u:456: yatanto yoginaś cainaṃ paśyanty ātmany avasthitam |
GE07bhg4c15u:458: śrīdharaḥ : durjñeyaś cāyaṃ yato vivekiṣv api kecit paśyanti kecin na paśyantīty āha yatanta iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:459: yatanto dhyānādibhiḥ prayatamānā yoginaḥ kecid enam ātmānam ātmani dehe 'vasthitaṃ viviktaṃ paśyanti |
GE07bhg4c15u:460: śāstrābhyāsādibhiḥ prayatnaṃ kurvāṇā apy akṛtātmāno 'viśuddha-cittā ata evācetaso manda-mataya enaṃ na paśyanti ||11||
GE07bhg4c15u:461: madhusūdanaḥ : paśyanti jñāna-cakṣuṣa ity etad vivṛṇoti yatanta iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:462: ātmani sva-buddhāv avasthitaṃ pratiphalitam enam ātmānam yatanto dhyānādibhiḥ prayatamānā yogina eva paśyanti |
GE07bhg4c15u:464: yatamānā apy akṛtātmāno yajñādibhir aśodhitāntaḥ-karaṇā ata evācetaso viveka-śūnyā nainaṃ paśyantīti vimūḍhā nānupaśyantīty etad vivaraṇam ||11||
GE07bhg4c15u:465: viśvanāthaḥ : te ca vivekino yatamānā yogina evety āha yatanta iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:467: baladevaḥ : jñāna-cakṣuṣaḥ paśyanti ity etad vivṛṇvan durjñānatāṃ tasyāh yatanta iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:468: kecid yogino yatamānāḥ śravaṇādy-upāyān anutiṣṭhanta ātmani śarīre 'vasthitam enam ātmānaṃ paśyanti |
GE07bhg4c15u:469: kecid yatamānā apy akṛtātmāno 'nirmala-cittā ato 'vacetaso 'nudita-viveka-jñānā enaṃ na paśyantīti durjñeyam ātma-tattvam ity arthaḥ ||11||
GE07bhg4c15u:473: yac candramasi yac cāgnau tat tejo viddhi māmakam ||12||
GE07bhg4c15u:474: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ na tad bhāsayate sūrya ity ādinā pārameśvaraṃ paraṃ dhāmoktam |
GE07bhg4c15u:476: tatra ca saṃsāriṇo 'bhāvam āśaṅkya saṃsāri-svarūpaṃ dehādi-vyatiriktaṃ darśitam |
GE07bhg4c15u:477: idānīṃ tad eva pārameśvaraṃ rūpam ananta-śaktitvena nirūpayati yad ity ādi-caturbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:478: ādiyādiṣu sthitaṃ yad aneka-prakāraṃ tejo viśvaṃ prakāśayati tat sarvaṃ tejo madīyam eva jānīhi ||12||
GE07bhg4c15u:480_0: idānīṃ yat padaṃ sarvāvabhāsana-kṣamā apy ādityādayo bhāsayituṃ na kṣamante yat-prāptāś
GE07bhg4c15u:480_1: ca mumukṣavaḥ punaḥ saṃsārāya nāvartante yasya ca padasyopādi-bhedam anu vidhīyamānā
GE07bhg4c15u:480_2: jīvā ghaṭākāśādaya ivākāśasya kalpitāṃśā mṛṣaiva saṃsāram anubhavanti tasya padasya
GE07bhg4c15u:480_4: iti prāg uktaṃ vivarītuṃ caturbhiḥ ślokair ātmano vibhūti-saṃkṣepam āha bhagavān yad iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:481: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ nemā vidyuto bhānti kuto 'yam agniḥ [KaṭhU 2.2.15] ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c15u:482: tam eva bhāntam anubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti [KaṭhU 2.2.15] iti śruty-artham anena vyākhyāyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:483: yad āditya-gataṃ tejaś caitnyātmakaṃ jyotir yac candramasi yac cāgnau sthitaṃ tejo jagad akhilam
GE07bhg4c15u:484: avabhāsayate tat tejo māmakaṃ madīyaṃ viddhi |
GE07bhg4c15u:485: yadyapi sthāvara-jaṅgameṣu samānaṃ caitanyātmakaṃ jyotis tathāpi sattvotkarṣeṇādityādīnām utkarṣāt tatraivāvistarāṃ caitanya-jyotir iti tair viśeṣyate yad āditya-gatam ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c15u:486: yathā tulye 'pi mukha-saṃnidhāne kāṣṭha-kuḍyādau na mukham āvirbhavati |
GE07bhg4c15u:487_0: ādarśādau ca svacche svacchatare ca tāratamyenāvirbhavati tadvad yad āditya-gataṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:487_1: teja ity uktvā punas tat tejo viddhi māmakam iti tejo-grahaṇād yad ādityādi-gataṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:487_2: tejaḥ prakāśaḥ para-prakāśa-samarthaṃ sita-bhāsvaraṃ rūpaṃ jagad akhilaṃ rūpavad
GE07bhg4c15u:488: evaṃ yac candramasi yac cāgnau jagad-avabhāsakaṃ tejas tan māmākaṃ viddhīti vibhūti-kathanāya dvitīyo 'py artho draṣṭavyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:489: anyathā tan māmakaṃ viddhīty etāvad brūyāt tejo-grahaṇam antareṇaiveti bhāvaḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c15u:491: tad evaṃ jīvasya baddhāvasthāyāṃ yat yat prāpya-vastu tatrāham eva sūrya-candrādy-ātmakaḥ sann upakaromīty āha yad iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:492_0: āditya-sthitaṃ teja eva udaya-parvate prātar uditya jīvasya dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-bhoga-sādhana-karma-pravartanārthaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:492_1: jagad bhāsayata evaṃ ca yac candramasi aganau ca tat tad akhilaṃ māmakam eva |
GE07bhg4c15u:494: tat tejasa eva tat-tad-vibhūtir iti bhāvaḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c15u:496: atha mad-aṃśasya jīvasya saṃsāra-raktasya mumukṣoś ca bhoga-mokṣa-sādhanam aham eveti bhāvenāha yad iti caturbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:497: āditye sthitaṃ yat tejo yac candre 'gnau ca sthitaṃ sat sarvaṃ jagat prakāśayati,
GE07bhg4c15u:499: uditena sūryeṇa jvalitena ca vahninādṛṣṭa-bhoga-sādhanāni karmāṇi niṣpadyante |
GE07bhg4c15u:501: uditena candreṇa cauṣadhi-poṣa-tāpa-śānti-jyotsnāvihārās tathābhūtā bhavantīti teṣāṃ tat-tat-sādhakaṃ tejo mat-tejo-vibhūtir ity arthaḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c15u:502: gām āviśya ca bhūtāni dhārayāmy aham ojasā |
GE07bhg4c15u:503: puṣṇāmi cauṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ somo bhūtvā rasātmakaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c15u:505: gāṃ pṛthvīm ojasā balenādhiṣṭhāyāham eva carācarāṇi bhūtāni dhārayāmi |
GE07bhg4c15u:506: aham eva rasamayaḥ somo bhūtvā brīhy-ādy-auṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ saṃvardhayāmi ||13||
GE07bhg4c15u:508: gāṃ pṛthivīm pṛthivī-devatā-rūpeṇāviśyaujasā nijena balena pṛthivīṃ dhūli-muṣṭi-tulyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya bhūtāni pṛthivyādheyāni vastūny aham eva dhārayāmi |
GE07bhg4c15u:509: anyathā pṛthivī sikatā-muṣṭivad viśīryatādho nimajjed vā |
GE07bhg4c15u:510: yena dyaur ugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḍhā [YajuḥK 1.8.5, TaittS 4.1.8] iti mantra-varṇāt |
GE07bhg4c15u:511: sa dādhāra pṛthivīm [Ṛk 8.7.3.1] iti ca hiraṇyagarbha-bhāvāpannaṃ bhagavantam evāha |
GE07bhg4c15u:513: rasātmakaḥ sarva-rasa-svabhāvaḥ somo bhūtvauṣadhīḥ sarvā brīhi-yavādyāḥ pṛthivyāṃ jātā aham eva puṣṇāmi puṣṭimatī rasa-svādumatīś ca karomi ||13||
GE07bhg4c15u:514: viśvanāthaḥ : gāṃ pṛthvīm ojasā sva-śaktyāviśyādhiṣṭhāyāham eva carācarāṇi bhūtāni dhārayāmi |
GE07bhg4c15u:515: tathāham evāmṛta-rasamayaḥ somo bhūtvā brīhy-ādy-auṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ saṃvardhayāmi ||13||
GE07bhg4c15u:517: gām iti pāṃśu-muṣṭi-tulyāṃ gāṃ pṛthivīm ojasā sva-śaktyāviśya dṛḍhīkṛtya bhūtāni sthira-carāṇi dhārayāmi |
GE07bhg4c15u:518: mantra-varṇaś caivam āha -- yena dyaur ugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḍhā [Ṛk 8.7.3.1] iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:520: tathāham eva rasātmakaḥ somo 'mṛtamayaś candro bhūtvā sarvā auṣadhīr nikhilā brīhy-ādyāḥ puṣṇāmi |
GE07bhg4c15u:522: tathā ca bhūmiloke sthitasya jīvasya vividha-prāsāda-bāṭikā-taḍāgādi-krīḍā-sthānāni nirmāya nānā-rasān bhuñjānasya tat-tat-sādhanam aham eveti ||13||
GE07bhg4c15u:525: ahaṃ vaiśvānaro bhūtvā prāṇināṃ deham āśritaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:528_0: aham īśvara eva vaiśvānaro jaṭharāgnir bhūtvā prāṇināṃ dehasyāntaḥ praviśya prānāpānābhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:528_1: ca tad-uddīpakābhyāṃ sahitaḥ prāṇibhir bhuktaṃ bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ lehyaṃ coṣyaṃ ceti
GE07bhg4c15u:529: tatra yad dantair avakhaṇḍyāvakhaṇḍya bhakṣyate pūpādi tad bhakṣyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:530: yat tu kevalaṃ jihvayā viloḍya nigīryate pāyasādi tad bhojyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:531: yaj jihvāyāṃ nikṣipya rasāsvādena kramaśo nigīryate dravībhūtaṃ guḍādi tal lehyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:532: yat tu daṃṣṭrādibhir niṣpīḍya sārāṃśaṃ nigīryāvaśiṣṭaṃ tyajyata ikṣu-daṇḍādi tac coṣyam iti caturvidho 'sya bhedaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c15u:534_0: aham īśvara eva vaiśvānaro jaṭharo 'gnir bhūtvā ayam agnir vaiśvānaro yo 'yam antaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:534_1: puruṣe yenedam annaṃ pacyate yad idam adyate [BAU 5.9.1] ity ādi śruti-pratipāditaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:534_2: san prāṇināṃ sarveṣāṃ deham āśrito 'ntaḥ praviṣṭaḥ prānāpānābhyāṃ tad-uddīpakābhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:534_3: saṃyuktaḥ saṃdhukṣitaḥ san pacāmi prāṇibhir bhuktam annaṃ caturvidham bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:535: tatra yad dantair avakhaṇḍyāvakhaṇḍya bhakṣyate pūpādi tad bhakṣyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:536: yat tu kevalaṃ jihvayā viloḍya nigīryate sūpaudanādi tad bhojyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:537: yaj jihvāyāṃ nikṣipya rasāsvādena nigīryate kiṃcid dravībhūtaṃ guḍa-rasālā-śikhariṇy-ādi tal lehyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:538: yat tu dantair niṣpīḍya rasāṃśaṃ nigīryāvaśiṣṭaṃ tyajyate yathekṣu-daṇḍādi tac coṣyam iti bhedaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:539: | bhoktā yaḥ so 'gnri vaiśvānaro yad bhojyam annaṃ sa somas tad etad ubhayam agnīṣomau sarvam iti dhyāyato 'nna-doṣa-lepo na bhavatīty api draṣṭavyam ||14||
GE07bhg4c15u:541: vaiśvānaro jaṭharānalaḥ prāṇāpānābhyāṃ tad uddīpakābhyāṃ sahitaś caturvidhaṃ bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ lehyaṃ coṣyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:545: baladevaḥ : bhogyānām annādīnāṃ pāka-hetuś cāham evety āha aham iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:546_0: vaiśvānaro jaṭharāgnis tac-charīrako bhūtvā prāṇināṃ sarveṣāṃ deham udaram āśritaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:546_1: prānāpānābhyāṃ tad-uddīpakābhyāṃ samāyuktaś ca sann ahaṃ tair bhuktaṃ caturvidham
GE07bhg4c15u:547: śrutiś caivam āha ayam agnir vaiśvānaro yo 'yam antaḥ puruṣe yenedaṃ annaṃ pacyate ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c15u:548: tathā cāham eva jāṭharāgni-śarīras tad-upakārīty evam āha sūtrakāraḥ -- śabdādibhyo 'ntaḥ pratiṣṭhānāc ca ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c15u:549: annasya cāturvidhyaṃ ca bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ lehyaṃ cūṣyaṃ ceti bhedāt |
GE07bhg4c15u:561: vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva vedyo
GE07bhg4c15u:563: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca sarvasya prāni-jātasya hṛdi samyag-antaryāmi-rūpeṇa praviṣṭo 'ham |
GE07bhg4c15u:564: ataś ca matta eva hetoḥ prāṇi-mātrasya pūrvānbhūtārtha-viṣayā smṛtir bhavati |
GE07bhg4c15u:567: vedaiś ca sarvais tat-tad-devatādi-rūpeṇāham eva vedyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:570: veda-vid eva ca vedārtha-vid apy aham eva ||15||
GE07bhg4c15u:572: sarvasya brahmādi-sthāvarāntasya prāṇi-jātasyāham ātmā san hṛdi buddhau saṃniviṣtaḥ sa eṣa iha praviṣṭaḥ [BAU 1.4.7] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:573: anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāma-rūpe vyākaravāṇi [ChāU 6.3.2] iti ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:574: ato matta ātmana eva hetoḥ prāṇi-jātasya yathānurūpaṃ smṛtir etaj janmani pūrvānubhūtārtha-viṣayā vṛttir yogināṃ ca janmāntarānubhūtārtha-viṣayāpi |
GE07bhg4c15u:575: tathā matta eva jñānaṃ viṣayendriya-saṃyogajaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c15u:577: evaṃ kāma-krodha-śokādi-vyākula-cetasām apohanaṃ ca smṛti-jñānayor apāyaś ca matta eva bhavati |
GE07bhg4c15u:578: evaṃ svasya jīva-rūpatām uktvā brahma-rūpatām āha - vedaiś ca sarvair indrādi-devatā-prakāśakair api aham eva vedyaḥ sarvātmatvāt |
GE07bhg4c15u:582: agniṃ yamaṃ mātariśvānam āhuḥ || [Ṛk 2.3.22.6] iti mantra-varṇāt |
GE07bhg4c15u:583: eṣa u hy eva sarve devāḥ iti ca śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:585: na kevalam etāvad eva veda-vid eva cāhaṃ karma-kāṇḍopāsanā-kāṇḍa-jñāna-kāṇḍātmaka-mantra-brāhmaṇa-rūpa-sarva-vedārtha-vic cāham eva |
GE07bhg4c15u:586: ataḥ sādhūktaṃ brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham [Gītā 14.27] ity ādi ||15||
GE07bhg4c15u:588: yathaiva jaṭhare jaṭharāgnir ahaṃ tathaiva sarvasya carācarasya hṛdi sanniviṣṭo buddhi-tattva-rūpo 'ham eva |
GE07bhg4c15u:589: yato matto buddhi-tattvād eva pūrvānubhūtārtha-viṣayānusmṛtir bhavati |
GE07bhg4c15u:590: tathā viṣayendriya-yogajaṃ jñānaṃ ca apohanaṃ smṛti-jñānayor apagamaś ca bhavatīti |
GE07bhg4c15u:591: jīvasya bandhāvasthāyāṃ svasyopakārakatvam uktvā mokṣāvasthāyāṃ yat prāpyaṃ tatrāpy upakāratvam āha vedair iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:592: veda-vyāsa-dvārā vedānta-kṛd aham eva yato vedavid vedārtha-tattva-jño 'ham eva matto 'nyo vedārthaṃ na jānātīty arthaḥ ||15||
GE07bhg4c15u:593: baladevaḥ : prāṇināṃ jñānājñāna-hetuś cāham evety āha sarvasya ceti |
GE07bhg4c15u:594: tayoḥ soma-vaiśvānarayoḥ sarvasya ca prāṇi-vṛndasya hṛdi nikhila-pravṛtti-hetu-jñānodaya-dehe 'ham eva niyāmakatvena sanniviṣṭaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:597: ato matta eva sarvasya smṛtiḥ pūṛvānubhūta-vastu-viṣayānusandhi-jñānaṃ ca viṣayendriya-sannikarṣa-janyaṃ jāyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:598: tayor apohanaṃ pramoṣaś ca matto bhavati |
GE07bhg4c15u:599: evam uktaṃ uddhavena tvatto jñānaṃ hi jīvānāṃ pramoṣas tatra śaktitaḥ iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:600: evaṃ sāṃsārika-bhoga-sādhanatāṃ svasyoktvā mokṣa-sādhanatām āha vedaiś ceti |
GE07bhg4c15u:601: sarvair nikhilair vedair aham eva sarveśvaraḥ sarva-śaktimān kṛṣṇo vedyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:602: yo 'sau sarvair vedair gīyate iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:603: atra karma-kāṇḍena paramparayā jñāna-kāṇḍena tu sākṣād iti bodhyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:604: katham evaṃ pratyetavyam iti cet tatrāha vedānta-kṛd aham eveti |
GE07bhg4c15u:605: vedānām anto 'rtha-nirṇayas tat-kṛd aham eva bādarāyaṇātmanā |
GE07bhg4c15u:606: evam āha sūtra-kāraḥ -- ta tu samanvayāt [Vs 1.1.4] ity ādibhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:608: tatrāha vedavid eva cāham ity aham eva vedavid iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:609: bādarāyaṇaḥ san yam artham ahaṃ niraṇaiṣaṃ sa eva vedārthas tato 'nyathā tu bhrānti-vijṛmbhita iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:610: tathā ca mokṣa-pradasya sarveśvara-tattvasya vedair abodhanād aham eva mokṣa-sādhanam ||15||
GE07bhg4c15u:611: dvāv imau puruṣau loke kṣaraś cākṣara eva ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:614: idānīṃ tad dhāma paramaṃ mameti yad uktaṃ svakīyaṃ sarvottama-svarūpaṃ tad darśayati dvāv iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:615: kṣaraś cākṣaraś ceti dvāv imau puruṣau loke prasiddhau |
GE07bhg4c15u:616: tāv evāha tatra kṣaraḥ puruṣo nāma sarvāṇi bhūtāni brahmādi-sthāvarāntāni śarīrāṇi |
GE07bhg4c15u:619: parvata iva deheṣu naśyatsv api nirvikāratayā tiṣṭhatīti kūṭashtaś cetano bhoktā |
GE07bhg4c15u:620: sa tv akṣaraḥ puruṣa ity ucyate vivekibhiḥ ||16||
GE07bhg4c15u:622_1: nirupādhikaṃ śuddham ātmānaṃ pratipādayati kṛpayā bhagavān arjunāya dvāv imāv iti tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:623: dvāv imau pṛthag-rāśī-kṛtau puruṣau puruṣopādhitvena puruṣa-śabda-vyapadeśyau loke saṃsāre |
GE07bhg4c15u:624: kau tau ? ity āha kṣarākṣara eva ca kṣaratīti kṣaro vināśī kārya-rāśir ekaḥ puruṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:625: na kṣaratīty akṣaro vināśa-rahitaḥ kṣarākhyasya puruṣasyotpatti-bījaṃ bhagavato māyā-śaktir dvitīyaḥ puruṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:626: tau puruṣau vyācaṣṭe svayam eva bhagavān kṣaraḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni samastaṃ kārya-jātam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:629: sthitaḥ kūṭastho bhagavān māyā-śakti-rūpaḥ kāraṇopādhiḥ saṃsāra-bījatvenānantyād akṣara ucyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:630: kecit tu kṣara-śabdenācetana-vargam uktvā kūṭastho 'kṣara ucyata ity anena jīvam āhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:633: tasmāt kṣarākṣara-śabdābhyāṃ kārya-kāraṇopādhī ubhāv api jaḍāv evocyete ity eva yuktam ||16||
GE07bhg4c15u:635: yasmād aham eva vedavit tasmāt sarva-vedārtha-niṣkarṣaṃ saṅkṣepeṇa bravīmi śṛṇu ity āha dvāv imāv iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:636: loke caturdaśa-bhuvanātmake jaḍa-prapañce imau dvau puruṣau cetanau staḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:637: kau tāv ata āha kṣaraṃ sva-svarūpāt kṣarati vicyuto bhavatīti kṣaro jīvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:639: etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti |
GE07bhg4c15u:641: akṣaraṃ brahma paramam iti smṛteś ca akṣara-śabdo brahma-vācaka eva dṛṣṭaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:642_0: kṣarākṣarayor arthaṃ punar viśadayati sarvāṇi bhūtāni eko jīva eva anādy-avidyayā
GE07bhg4c15u:642_1: svarūpa-vicyutaḥ san karma-paratantraḥ samaṣṭy-ātmako brahmādi-sthāvarāntāni bhūtāni bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:644: dvitīya-puruṣo 'kṣaras tu kūṭastha ekenaiva svarūpeṇavicyutimatā sarva-kāla-vyāpī
GE07bhg4c15u:645: | ekarūpatayā tu yaḥ kāla-vyāpī sa kūṭasthaḥ ity amaraḥ ||16||
GE07bhg4c15u:646: baladevaḥ : bādarāyaṇātmanā nirṇītaṃ vedārthaṃ saṅkṣipyāha dvāv iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:647: lokyate tattvam anena iti vyutpatter loke vede |
GE07bhg4c15u:648: dvau puruṣau prathitau imāv iti pramāṇa-siddhatā sūcyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:649: tau kāv ity āha kṣaraś ceti |
GE07bhg4c15u:651: akṣaras tad-abhāvād ekāvastho mukto 'cid-viyogaika-dharma-sambandhād ekatvena nirdiṣṭaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:652: kṣarākṣarau sphuṭayati sarvāṇi brahmādi-stambāntāni bhūtāni kṣaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:656: idaṃ jñānam upāśritya ity ādeś ca bahutva-saṅkhyākaḥ saḥ ||16||
GE07bhg4c15u:659: uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:660: yo loka-trayam āviśya bibharty avyaya īśvaraḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c15u:661: śrīdharaḥ : yad artham etau lakṣitau tam āha uttama iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:662: etābhyāṃ kṣarāksarābhyām anyo vilakṣaṇas tu uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:663: vailakṣaṇyam evāha paramaś cāsāv ātmā cety udāhṛtaḥ uktaḥ śrutibhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:665: paramatvenākṣarāc cetanād bhoktur vilakṣaṇa ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:667: ya īśvara īśana-śīlo 'vyayaś ca nirvikāra eva san loka-trayaṃ kṛsnam āviśya bibharti pālayati ||17||
GE07bhg4c15u:669: ābhyāṃ kṣarākṣarābhyāṃ vilakṣaṇaḥ kṣarākṣaropādhi-dvaya-doṣeṇāspṛṣṭo nitya-śuddha-buddha-mukta-svabhāvaḥ uttama iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:670: uttama utkṛṣṭatamaḥ puruṣas tv anyonya evātyanta-vilakṣaṇa ābhyāṃ kṣarākṣarābhyāṃ jaḍa-rāśibhyām ubhaya-bhāsakas tṛtīyaś cetana-rāśir ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:671_1: 'vidyā-kalpitātmabhyaḥ paramaḥ prakṛṣṭo 'kalpito brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhety ukta
GE07bhg4c15u:671_2: ātmā ca sarva-bhūtānāṃ pratyak-cetana ity ataḥ paramātmety uktao vedānteṣu |
GE07bhg4c15u:672: yaḥ paramātmā loka-trayam bhūr-bhuvaḥ-svar-ākhyaṃ sarvaṃ jagad iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c15u:673: āviśya svakīyayā māyā-śaktyādhiṣṭhāya bibharti sattā-sphūrti-pradānena dhārayati poṣayati ca | kīdṛśaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:675: avyayaḥ sarva-vikāra-śūnya īśvaraḥ sarvasya niyantā nārāyaṇaḥ sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ paramātmety udāhṛta ity anvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:677: viśvanāthaḥ : jñānibhir upāsyaṃ brahmoktvā yogibhir upāsyaṃ paramātmānam āha uttama iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:679: jñānibhyaś cādhiko yogīty upāsaka-vaiśiṣṭyād evopāsya-vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca labhyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:680: paramātma-tattvam eva darśayati ya īśvara īsana-śīlo 'vyayo nirvikāra eva san loka-trayaṃ kṛtsnam āviśya bibharti dhārayati pālayati ca ||17||
GE07bhg4c15u:681: baladevaḥ : yad arthaṃ dvau puruṣau nirūpitau tam āha uttama iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:682: anyaḥ kṣarākṣarābhyāṃ na tu tayor evaikaḥ saṅkalpa iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:685: na caitaj jagad-vidhāraṇa-pālana-rūpam īśanaṃ baddhasya jīvasya karmāsambhavāt |
GE07bhg4c15u:686: na ca muktasya jagad-vyāpāra-varjam iti pratiṣedhāc ca ||17||
GE07bhg4c15u:689: yasmāt kṣaram atīto 'ham akṣarād api cottamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:690: ato 'smi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ ||18||
GE07bhg4c15u:691: śrīdharaḥ : evam uktaṃ puruṣottamatvam ātmano nāma-nirvacanena darśayati yasmādi it |
GE07bhg4c15u:692: yasmāt kṣaraṃ jaḍa-vargam atikrānto 'haṃ nityam uktatvāt |
GE07bhg4c15u:693: akṣarāc cetana-vargād apy uttamaś ca niyantṛtvāt |
GE07bhg4c15u:694: ato loke vede ca puruṣottama iti prathitaḥ prakhyāto 'smi |
GE07bhg4c15u:695: tathā ca śrutiḥ - sa eva sarvasyeśānaḥ sarvasyādhipatiḥ sarvam idaṃ praśāstīty ādi ||18||
GE07bhg4c15u:697_0: idānīṃ yathā-vyākhyāteśvarasya kṣarākṣara-vilakṣaṇasya puruṣottama ity etat prasiddha-nāma-nirvacanenedṛśaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:697_1: parameśvaro 'ham evety ātmānaṃ darśayati bhagavān brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāhaṃ [Gītā
GE07bhg4c15u:697_2: 14.27] tad dhāma paramaṃ mama [Gītā 15.6] ityādi prāg-ukta-nija-mahima-nirdhāraṇāya yasmād iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:698_0: yasmāt kṣaraṃ kāryatvena vināśinaṃ māyāmayaṃ saṃsāra-vṛklṣam aśvatthākhyam atīto
GE07bhg4c15u:698_1: 'tikrānto 'haṃ parameśvaro 'kṣarād api māyākhyād avyākṛtād akṣarāt parataḥ para iti
GE07bhg4c15u:699: ataḥ kṣarākṣarābhyāṃ puruṣotpādhibhyām adhyāsena puruṣa-pada-vyapadśyābhyām uttamatvād asmi bhavāmi loke vede ca prathitaḥ prakhyātaḥ puruṣottama
GE07bhg4c15u:700: iti sa uttamaḥ puruṣa iti veda udāhṛta eva loke ca kavi-kāvyādau harir yathaikaḥ puruṣottamaḥ smṛtaḥ ity ādi prasiddham |
GE07bhg4c15u:704: nārāyaṇasya mahimā na hi mānam eti ||
GE07bhg4c15u:710: yogibhir upāsyaṃ paramātmānam uktvā bhaktair upāsyaṃ bhagavantaṃ vadan bhagavattve 'pi svasya kṛṣṇa-svarūpasya puruṣottama iti nāma vyācakṣāṇaḥ sarvotkarṣam āha yasmād iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:711: kṣaraṃ puruṣaṃ jīvātmānam atītaḥ akṣarāt puruṣāt brahmata uttamād avikārāt paramātmanaḥ puruṣād apy uttamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:717: ca-kārād bhagavato vaikuṇṭha-nāthādeḥ sakāśād api ete cāṃśa-kalāḥ puṃsaḥ kṛṣṇas tu bhagavān svayam iti sūtokter aham uttamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:718: atra yadyapy ekam eva sac-cid-ānanda-svarūpaṃ vastu brahma-paramātma-bhagavat-śabdair ucyate na tu vastutaḥ svarūpataḥ ko 'pi bhedo 'sti svarūpa-dvayābhāvāt (BhP 6.9.35)
GE07bhg4c15u:720: tad api tat-tad-upāsakānāṃ sādhanataḥ phalataś ca bheda-darśanāt bheda iva vyavahriyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:721: tathā hi brahma-paramātma-bhagavad-upāsakānāṃ krameṇa tat-tat-prāpti-sādhanaṃ jñānaṃ yogo bhaktiś ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:722: phalaṃ ca jñāna-yogayor vastuto mokṣa eva, bhaktes tu premavat-pārṣadatvaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:723: tatra bhaktyā vinā jñāna-yogābhyāṃ naiṣkarmyam apy acyuta-bhāva-varjitaṃ na śobhate [BhP 1.5.12] iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:724: pureha bhūman bahavo 'pi yoginaḥ [BhP 10.14.5] ity ādi-darśanāt na mokṣa iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:725: brahmopāsakaiḥ paramātmopāsakaiḥ sva-sādhya-phala-siddhy-arthaṃ bhagavato bhaktir avaśyaṃ kartavyaiva |
GE07bhg4c15u:726: bhagavad-upāsakas tu sva-sādhya-phala-siddhy-arthaṃ na brahmopāsanāpi paramātmopāsanā kriyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:727: na jñānaṃ na ca vairāgyaṃ prāyaḥ śreyo bhaved iha [BhP 11.20.31] iti,
GE07bhg4c15u:728: yat karmabhir yat tapasā jñāna-vairāgyataś ca yat [BhP 11.20.32] ity ādau -
GE07bhg4c15u:737: ataeva bhagavad-upāsanayā svargāpavarga-premādīni sarva-phalāny eva labdhuṃ śakyante |
GE07bhg4c15u:738: brahma-paramātmopāsanayā tu na premādīnīty ata eva brahma-paramātmābhyāṃ bhagavad-utkarṣaḥ khalu abhede 'py ucyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:739: yathā tejastvenābhede 'pi jyotir dīpāgni-puñjeṣu madhye śītādy-ārti-kṣayād dhetor agni-puñja eva śreṣṭha ucyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:740: tatrāpi bhagavataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇasya tu parama evotkarṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:742: yena brahmopāsanā-paripākato labhyo nirvāṇa-mokṣaḥ sva-dveṣṭṛbhyo 'py agha-bak-jarāsandhādibhyo mahā-pāpibhyo datta iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:743: ataeva brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham ity atra yathāvad eva vyākhyātaṃ śrī-svāmi-caraṇaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:748: tato vāraṃ vāraṃ bhajata kuśalārambha-kṛtinaḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:752: kṛṣṇāt paraṃ kim api tattvam ahaṃ na jāne || iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:757: ity uktavadbhiḥ kṛṣṇe sarvotkarṣa eva vyavasthāpita ity ataḥ dvāv imau ity ādi śloka-trayasyāsya vyākhyāyām asyām abhyasūyā nāviṣkartavyā |
GE07bhg4c15u:759: baladevaḥ : atha puruṣottama-nāma-nirvacanaṃ svasya tattvam āha yasmād iti uttama utkṛṣṭatamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:760: loke pauruṣeyāgame lokyate vedārtho 'nena iti nirukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:761: vede tāvad eṣa samprasādo 'smāc charīrāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotīrūpaṃ sampadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate,
GE07bhg4c15u:762: sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ ity ādau prathitaḥ yat paraṃ jyotiḥ samprasādenopasampannaṃ sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ paramātmetiy arthaḥ | loke ca -
GE07bhg4c15u:769: yo mām evam asaṃmūḍho jānāti puruṣottamam |
GE07bhg4c15u:770: sa sarva-vid bhajati māṃ sarva-bhāvena bhārata ||19||
GE07bhg4c15u:771: śrīdharaḥ : evambhūteśvarasya jñātuḥ phalam āha ya iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:772: evam ukta-prakāreṇāsammūḍho niścita-matiḥ san yo māṃ puruṣottamaṃ jānāti sa sarva-bhāvena sarva-prakāreṇa mām eva bhajati |
GE07bhg4c15u:774: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ nāma-nirvacana-jñāne phalam āha yo mām iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:775_0: yo mām īśvaram evaṃ yathokta-nāma-nirvacanenāsaṃmūḍho manuṣya evāyaṃ kaścit kṛṣṇa
GE07bhg4c15u:775_1: iti saṃmoha-varjito jānāty ayam īśvara eveti puruṣottamaṃ prāg vyākhyātaṃ sa māṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:775_2: bhajati sevate sarvavin māṃ sarvātmānaṃ vettīti sa eva sarvajñaḥ sarva-bhāvena prema-lakṣaṇena
GE07bhg4c15u:775_3: bhakti-yogena he bhārata | ato yad uktam -
GE07bhg4c15u:777: sa guṇān samatītyaitān brahma-bhūyāya kalpate || [Gītā 14.26] iti tad upapannam |
GE07bhg4c15u:778: yathoktaṃ brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham iti tad apy upapannataram |
GE07bhg4c15u:783: viśvanāthaḥ : nanv etasmiṃs tvayā vyavasthāpite 'py arthe vādino vivadanta eva,
GE07bhg4c15u:784: tatra vivadantāṃ te man-māyā-mohitāḥ sādhus tu na muhyatīty āha yo mām iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:786: sa eva sarvavid anadhīta-śāstre 'pi sa sarva-śāstrārtha-tattva-jñaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:787: tad-anyaḥ kilādhītādhyāśita-sarva-śāstre 'pi saṃmūḍhaḥ samyaṅ-mūrkha eveti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:788: tathā ya evaṃ jānāti sa eva māṃ sarvato-bhāvena bhajati |
GE07bhg4c15u:789: tad anye bhajann api na māṃ bhajatīty arthaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c15u:790: baladevaḥ : tātparya-dyotanāya puruṣottamatva-vettuḥ phalam āha yo mām iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:791: evaṃ mad-ukta-niruktyā na tv aśva-karṇādivat saṃjñā-mātratvena |
GE07bhg4c15u:793: prokte puruṣottamatve saṃśaya-śūnyaḥ san, sa śloka-trayasyaivārthaṃ jānan sarva-vit |
GE07bhg4c15u:795: puruṣottamatvajño māṃ sarva-bhāvena sarva-prakāreṇa bhajaty upāste |
GE07bhg4c15u:796: sarva-vedārtha-vettari sarva-bhakty-aṅgānuṣṭhātari ca yo me prasādaḥ sa tasmin bhaved iti me puruṣottamatve sandihānas tv adhīta-sarva-vedo 'py ajñaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:797: sarvathā bhajann apy abhakta iti bhāvaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c15u:800: iti guhyatamaṃ śāstram idam uktaṃ mayānagha |
GE07bhg4c15u:801: etad buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛta-kṛtyaś ca bhārata ||20||
GE07bhg4c15u:803: ity anena saṃkṣepa-prakāreṇa guhyatamam atirahasyaṃ sampūrṇaṃ śāstram eva mayoktam |
GE07bhg4c15u:804: na tu punar viṃśati-ślokam adhyāya-mātraṃ he anagha vyasana-śūnya |
GE07bhg4c15u:805: ata etan mad-uktaṃ śāstraṃ buddhyā buddhimān samyag jñānī syaāt |
GE07bhg4c15u:807: yo 'pi ko 'pi he bhārata tvaṃ kṛta-kṛtyo 'sīti kiṃ vaktavyam iti bhāvaḥ ||20||
GE07bhg4c15u:813: madhusūdanaḥ : idānīm adhyāyārthaṃ stuvann upasaṃharati itīti |
GE07bhg4c15u:814: iti anena prakāreṇa guhyatamaṃ rahasyatamaṃ sampūrṇaṃ śāstram eva saṃkṣepeṇedam asminn adhyāye mayoktaṃ he 'naghāvyasana |
GE07bhg4c15u:815: etad buddhvānyo 'pi yaḥ kaścid buddhimān ātma-jñānavān syāt kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtyaṃ yena na punaḥ kṛtyāntaraṃ yasyāsti sa kṛtakṛtyaś ca syāt |
GE07bhg4c15u:816: viśiṣṭa-janma-prasūtena brāhmaṇena yat kartavyaṃ tat sarvaṃ bhagavat-tattve vidite kṛtaṃ bhavet na tv anyathā kartavyaṃ parisamāpyate kasyacid ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:817: he bhārata tvaṃ tu mahākula-prasūtaḥ svayaṃ ca vyasana-rahita iti kula-guṇena sva-guṇena caitad buddhvā kṛta-kṛtyo bhaviṣyasīti kim u vaktavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ ||20||
GE07bhg4c15u:821: kṛṣṇāt paraṃ kim api tattvam ahaṃ na jāne ||1||
GE07bhg4c15u:822: sadā sadānanda-pade nimagnaṃ mano manobhāvam apākaroti |
GE07bhg4c15u:823: gatāgatāyāsam apāsya sadyaḥ parāparātītam upaiti tattvam ||2||
GE07bhg4c15u:824: śaivāḥ saurāś ca gāṇeśā vaiṣṇavāḥ śakti-pūjakāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:825: bhavanti yan-mayāḥ sarve so 'ham asmi paraḥ śivaḥ ||3||
GE07bhg4c15u:827: na śaknuvanti ye soḍhuṃ te mūḍhā nirayaṃ gatāḥ ||4||
GE07bhg4c15u:831: viṃśatyā ślokair ebhir atirahasyaṃ śāstram eva sampūrṇaṃ mayoktam ||20||
GE07bhg4c15u:833: kṛṣṇa eva mahotkarṣa ity adhyāyārtha īritaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c15u:835: gītāsv ayaṃ pañcadaśaḥ saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām ||
GE07bhg4c15u:837: baladevaḥ : athaitad apātreṣv aprakāśyam iti bhāvenāha itīti |
GE07bhg4c15u:838: ity evaṃ saṃkṣepa-rūpaṃ puruṣottamatva-nirūpakam idaṃ triślokī-śāstraṃ tubhyaṃ parama-bhaktāya mayoktam |
GE07bhg4c15u:839: he anagha, tvaāpy apātreṣu naitat prakāśyam iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:842: baddhān muktāc ca yaḥ puṃso bhinnas tad-bhṛt tad-uttamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:843: sa pumān harir eveti prāptaṃ pañcadaśād ataḥ ||
